layout.title: Customize shell widget positioning
layout.description: Overrides default widget position in the application layout

visible.title: Top Bar Visibility
visible.description: Whether to show the top bar or not, yes for always showing, no for always not showing, automatic for adjusting to screen size

schema.title: Kernel logo
schema.description: Kernel logo in the top area

autoScrollOutputs.title: Auto Scroll Outputs
autoScrollOutputs.description: Whether to auto scroll the output area when the outputs become too long

schema.title: File Browser Widget - File Actions
schema.description: File Browser widget - File Actions settings.

toolbar.title: File browser toolbar items

disabled.title: Whether the item is ignored or not

icon.title: Item icon id
icon.description: If defined, it will override the command icon

label.title: Item label
label.description: If defined, it will override the command label

contextMenu.title: The application context menu.

selector.description: The CSS selector for the context menu item.

disabled.description: Whether the menu is disabled or not
Whether the item is disabled or not

hiddenMode.title: Hidden mode of main panel widgets
hiddenMode.description: The method for hiding widgets in the main dock panel. Using `scale` will increase performance on Firefox but don't use it with Chrome, Chromium or Edge. Similar performance gains are seen with `contentVisibility` which is only available in Chromium-based browsers.

startMode.title: Start mode: ``, `single` or `multiple`
startMode.description: The mode under which JupyterLab should start. If empty, the mode will be imposed by the URL

layout.title: Customize shell widget positioning

toolbar.title: Top bar items

disabled.title: Whether the item is ignored or not

icon.title: Item icon id
icon.description: If defined, it will override the command icon

label.title: Item label
label.description: If defined, it will override the command label

caption.title: Item caption
caption.description: If defined, it will override the command caption

checkForUpdates.title: Check for JupyterLab updates
checkForUpdates.description: Whether to check for newer version of JupyterLab or not. It requires `fetchNews` to be `true` to be active. If `true`, it will make a request to a website.

doNotDisturbMode.title: Silence all notifications
doNotDisturbMode.description: If `true`, no toast notifications will be automatically displayed.

fetchNews.title: Fetch official Jupyter news
fetchNews.description: Whether to fetch news from Jupyter news feed. If `true`, it will make a request to a website.

modal.title: Modal Command Palette
modal.description: Whether the command palette should be modal or in the left panel.

allowedSchemes.title: Allowed URL Scheme
allowedSchemes.description: Scheme allowed by the HTML sanitizer.

autolink.title: Autolink URL replacement
autolink.description: Whether to replace URLs with links or not.

cssOverrides.description: The description field of each item is the CSS property that will be used to validate an override's value

theme.title: Selected Theme
theme.description: Application-level visual styling theme. Ignored when Adaptive Theme is enabled.

adaptive-theme.title: Adaptive Theme
adaptive-theme.description: Synchronize visual styling theme with system settings

preferred-light-theme.title: Preferred Light Theme
preferred-light-theme.description: Application-level light visual styling theme. Ignored when Adaptive Theme is disabled.

preferred-dark-theme.title: Preferred Dark Theme
preferred-dark-theme.description: Application-level dark visual styling theme. Ignored when Adaptive Theme is disabled.

theme-scrollbars.title: Scrollbar Theming
theme-scrollbars.description: Enable/disable styling of the application scrollbars

overrides.title: Theme CSS Overrides
overrides.description: Override theme CSS variables by setting key-value pairs here

toolbar.title: List of toolbar items
toolbar.description: An item is defined by a 'name', a 'command' name, and an 'icon' name

disabled.title: Whether the item is ignored or not

icon.title: Item icon id
icon.description: If defined, it will override the command icon

label.title: Item label
label.description: If defined, it will override the command label

caption.title: Item caption
caption.description: If defined, it will override the command caption

schema.title: CodeMirror
schema.description: Text editor settings for all CodeMirror editors.

defaultConfig.title: Default editor configuration
defaultConfig.description: Base configuration used by all CodeMirror editors.

showWidget.title: Show widget
showWidget.description: When to show the inline completer widget.

showShortcuts.title: Show shortcuts in the widget
showShortcuts.description: Whether to show shortcuts in the inline completer widget.

streamingAnimation.title: Streaming animation
streamingAnimation.description: Transition effect used when streaming tokens from model.

availableProviders.title: Completion providers rank setting.
availableProviders.description: Providers with higher rank will be shown before the ones with lower rank, providers with negative rank are disabled.

providerTimeout.title: Default timeout for a provider.
providerTimeout.description: If a provider can not return the response for a completer request before timeout, the result of this provider will be ignored. Value is in millisecond

interactionMode.title: Interaction mode
interactionMode.description:
Whether the console interaction mimics the notebook
or terminal keyboard shortcuts.

showAllKernelActivity.title: Show All Kernel Activity
showAllKernelActivity.description:
Whether the console defaults to showing all
kernel activity or just kernel activity originating from itself.

promptCellConfig.title: Prompt Cell Configuration
promptCellConfig.description: The configuration for all prompt cells; it will override the CodeMirror default configuration.

toolbar.title: CSV viewer toolbar items

disabled.title: Whether the item is ignored or not

icon.title: Item icon id
icon.description: If defined, it will override the command icon

label.title: Item label
label.description: If defined, it will override the command label

caption.title: Item caption
caption.description: If defined, it will override the command caption

toolbar.title: TSV viewer toolbar items

disabled.title: Whether the item is ignored or not

icon.title: Item icon id
icon.description: If defined, it will override the command icon

label.title: Item label
label.description: If defined, it will override the command label

caption.title: Item caption
caption.description: If defined, it will override the command caption

autosaveInterval.title: Autosave Interval
autosaveInterval.description: Length of save interval in seconds

confirmClosingDocument.title: Ask for confirmation to close a document
confirmClosingDocument.description: Whether to ask for confirmation to close a document or not.

lastModifiedCheckMargin.title: Margin for last modified timestamp check
lastModifiedCheckMargin.description: Max acceptable difference, in milliseconds, between last modified timestamps on disk and client

defaultViewers.title: Default Viewers
defaultViewers.description: Overrides for the default viewers for file types

renameUntitledFileOnSave.title: Rename Untitled File On First Save
renameUntitledFileOnSave.description: Whether to prompt to rename untitled file on first manual save.

searchDebounceTime.title: Search debounce time (ms)
searchDebounceTime.description: The debounce time in milliseconds applied to the search input field. The already opened input files will not be updated if you change that value

autoSearchInSelection.title: Search in selection automatically
autoSearchInSelection.description: When starting search, the 'search in selection' mode will be enabled if `any` text/cell is selected, or when `multiple` lines or cells are selected, or `never`.

navigateToCurrentDirectory.title: Navigate to current directory
navigateToCurrentDirectory.description: Whether to automatically navigate to a document's current directory

useFuzzyFilter.title: Filter on file name with a fuzzy search
useFuzzyFilter.description: Whether to apply fuzzy algorithm while filtering on file names

filterDirectories.title: Filter directories
filterDirectories.description: Whether to apply the search on directories

showLastModifiedColumn.title: Show last modified column
showLastModifiedColumn.description: Whether to show the last modified column

showFileSizeColumn.title: Show file size column
showFileSizeColumn.description: Whether to show the file size column

showHiddenFiles.title: Show hidden files
showHiddenFiles.description: Whether to show hidden files. The server parameter `ContentsManager.allow_hidden` must be set to `True` to display hidden files.

showFileCheckboxes.title: Use checkboxes to select items
showFileCheckboxes.description: Whether to show checkboxes next to files and folders

showFullPath.title: Show full path in browser bread crumbs
showFullPath.description: Whether to show full path in browser bread crumbs

sortNotebooksFirst.title: When sorting by name, group notebooks before other files
sortNotebooksFirst.description: Whether to group the notebooks away from files

schema.title: File Browser Open Browser Tab
schema.description: File Browser Open Browser Tab settings.

toolbar.title: File browser toolbar items

disabled.title: Whether the item is ignored or not

icon.title: Item icon id
icon.description: If defined, it will override the command icon

label.title: Item label
label.description: If defined, it will override the command label

caption.title: Item caption
caption.description: If defined, it will override the command caption

editorConfig.title: Editor Configuration
editorConfig.description:
The configuration for all text editors; it will override the CodeMirror default configuration.
If `fontFamily`, `fontSize` or `lineHeight` are `null`,
values from current theme are used.

scrollPastEnd.title: Scroll behavior
scrollPastEnd.description: Whether to scroll past the end of text document.

toolbar.title: Text editor toolbar items
toolbar.description:
Note: To disable a toolbar item,
copy it to User Preferences and add the
"disabled" key. Toolbar description:

disabled.title: Whether the item is ignored or not

icon.title: Item icon id
icon.description: If defined, it will override the command icon

label.title: Item label
label.description: If defined, it will override the command label

caption.title: Item caption
caption.description: If defined, it will override the command caption

toolbar.title: HTML viewer toolbar items

trustByDefault.title: Trust HTML by default
trustByDefault.description: Whether to trust HTML files upon opening

disabled.title: Whether the item is ignored or not

icon.title: Item icon id
icon.description: If defined, it will override the command icon

label.title: Item label
label.description: If defined, it will override the command label

caption.title: Item caption
caption.description: If defined, it will override the command caption

maxLogEntries.title: Log entry count limit
maxLogEntries.description: Maximum number of log entries to store in memory

flash.title: Status Bar Item flash
flash.description: Whether to flash on new log message or not

configuration.title: Language Server Configurations
configuration.description: Configuration to be sent to language server over LSP when initialized: see the specific language server's documentation for more

rank.title: Rank of the server
rank.description: When multiple servers match specific document/language, the server with the highest rank will be used

activate.title: Activate
activate.description: Enable or disable the language server services.

languageServers.title: Language Server
languageServers.description: Language-server specific configuration, keyed by implementation

setTrace.title: Ask servers to send trace notifications
setTrace.description: Whether to ask server to send logs with execution trace (for debugging). Accepted values are: "off", "messages", "verbose". Servers are allowed to ignore this request.

logAllCommunication.title: Log communication
logAllCommunication.description: Enable or disable the logging feature of the language servers.

menus.title: The application menu description.

disabled.description: Whether the menu is disabled or not
Whether the item is disabled or not

fontFamily.title: Font Family
fontFamily.description:
The font family used to render markdown.
If `null`, value from current theme is used.

fontSize.title: Font Size
fontSize.description:
The size in pixel of the font used to render markdown.
If `null`, value from current theme is used.

lineHeight.title: Line Height
lineHeight.description:
The line height used to render markdown.
If `null`, value from current theme is used.

lineWidth.title: Line Width
lineWidth.description:
The text line width expressed in CSS ch units.
If `null`, lines fit the viewport width.

hideFrontMatter.title: Hide Front Matter
hideFrontMatter.description:
Whether to hide YAML front matter.
The YAML front matter must be placed at the top of the document,
started by a line of three dashes (---) and ended by a line of
three dashes (---) or three points (...).

schema.title: Metadata Form
schema.description: Settings of the metadata form extension.

rank.description: The rank of the section in the right panel

showModified.description: Whether to show that values have been modified from defaults

properties.description: The property set up by extension

toolbar.title: Notebook panel toolbar items

disabled.title: Whether the item is ignored or not

icon.title: Item icon id
icon.description: If defined, it will override the command icon

label.title: Item label
label.description: If defined, it will override the command label

caption.title: Item caption
caption.description: If defined, it will override the command caption

showOnStatusBar.title: Show kernel status on toolbar or status bar.
showOnStatusBar.description: If `true`, the kernel status progression will be displayed in the status bar otherwise it will be in the toolbar.

enableKernelInitNotification.title: Notify about code execution if kernel is initializing
enableKernelInitNotification.description: Display notification if code cells are run while kernel is initializing.

codeCellConfig.title: Code Cell Configuration
codeCellConfig.description: The configuration for all code cells; it will override the CodeMirror default configuration.

defaultCell.title: Default cell type
defaultCell.description: The default type (markdown, code, or raw) for new cells

autoStartDefaultKernel.title: Automatically Start Preferred Kernel
autoStartDefaultKernel.description: Whether to automatically start the preferred kernel.

inputHistoryScope.title: Input History Scope
inputHistoryScope.description: Whether the line history for standard input (e.g. the ipdb prompt) should kept separately for different kernel sessions (`session`) or combined (`global`).

kernelShutdown.title: Shut down kernel
kernelShutdown.description: Whether to shut down or not the kernel when closing a notebook.

markdownCellConfig.title: Markdown Cell Configuration
markdownCellConfig.description: The configuration for all markdown cells; it will override the CodeMirror default configuration.

rawCellConfig.title: Raw Cell Configuration
rawCellConfig.description: The configuration for all raw cells; it will override the CodeMirror default configuration.

scrollPastEnd.title: Scroll past last cell
scrollPastEnd.description: Whether to be able to scroll so the last cell is at the top of the panel

recordTiming.title: Recording timing
recordTiming.description: Should timing data be recorded in cell metadata

overscanCount.title: Number of cells to render outside de the viewport
overscanCount.description: In 'full' windowing mode, this is the number of cells above and below the viewport.

maxNumberOutputs.title: The maximum number of output cells to be rendered in the output area.
maxNumberOutputs.description: Defines the maximum number of output cells to be rendered in the output area for cells with many outputs. The output area will have a head and the remaining outputs will be trimmed and not displayed unless the user clicks on the information message. Set to 0 to have the complete display.

scrollHeadingToTop.title: Scroll heading to top
scrollHeadingToTop.description: Whether to scroll heading to the document top when selecting it in the table of contents.

showEditorForReadOnlyMarkdown.title: Show editor for read-only Markdown cells
showEditorForReadOnlyMarkdown.description: Should an editor be shown for read-only markdown

kernelStatus.title: Kernel status icon configuration
kernelStatus.description: Defines the position and components of execution progress indicator.

documentWideUndoRedo.title: Enable undo/redo actions at the notebook document level.
documentWideUndoRedo.description: Enables the undo/redo actions at the notebook document level; aka undoing within a cell may undo the latest notebook change that happen in another cell. This is deprecated and will be removed in 5.0.0.

showHiddenCellsButton.title: Show hidden cells button if collapsed
showHiddenCellsButton.description: If set to true, a button is shown below collapsed headings, indicating how many cells are hidden beneath the collapsed heading.

renderingLayout.title: Rendering Layout
renderingLayout.description: Global setting to define the rendering layout in notebooks. 'default' or 'side-by-side' are supported.

sideBySideOutputRatio.title: Side-by-side output ratio
sideBySideOutputRatio.description: For the side-by-side rendering, the side-by-side output ratio defines the width of the output vs the input. Set 1 for same size, > 1 for larger output, < 1 for smaller output.

windowingMode.title: Windowing mode
windowingMode.description: 'defer': Improve loading time - Wait for idle CPU cycles to attach out of viewport cells - 'full': Best performance with side effects - Attach to the DOM only cells in viewport - 'none': Worst performance without side effects - Attach all cells to the viewport

accessKernelHistory.title: Kernel history access
accessKernelHistory.description: Enable kernel history access from notebook cells. Enabling this allows you to scroll through kernel history from a given notebook cell.

settingEditorType.title: Type of editor for the setting.
settingEditorType.description: Set the type of editor to use while editing your settings.

visible.title: Status Bar Visibility
visible.description: Whether to show status bar or not

numberingH1.title: Enable 1st headings numbering
numberingH1.description: Whether to number first-level headings or not.

numberHeaders.title: Enable headings numbering
numberHeaders.description: Whether to automatically number the headings or not.

includeOutput.title: Include cell output in headings
includeOutput.description: Whether to include cell output in headings or not.

syncCollapseState.title: Synchronize collapse state
syncCollapseState.description: If set to true, when a heading is collapsed in the table of contents the corresponding section in the document is collapsed as well and vice versa. This inhibits the cell output headings.

baseNumbering.title: Base level for the highest headings

locale.title: Language locale
locale.description: Set the interface display language. Examples: 'es_CO', 'fr_FR'. Set 'default' to use the server default locale. Requires corresponding language pack to be installed.

stringsPrefix.title: Localized strings prefix
stringsPrefix.description: Add a prefix to localized strings.
